resources.string: Quickly check the current status of satellites. Each satellite is color-coded based on its active or inactive status. Select a satellite from the list to view detailed information.
Access comprehensive information about the selected satellite. You can view technical details such as height, mass, and launch cost, along with the satellite\'s latest position.
View the latest position information of satellites and monitor their movements. Real-time position updates allow you to track each satellite in detail.
